description: Impress loved ones with this speedy chicken pasta salad that is on the table in 25 minutes. Tossed in a lemon-pepper sauce, this dish is refreshing, filling and delicious.
name: Lemon-pepper Chicken & Risoni Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups Birds Eye Australian garden peas
5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Cook risoni in a large saucepan of boiling water for 12 minutes or until al dente, adding beans and peas during the last 3 minutes of cooking. Drain, then refresh under cold water. Transfer to a large bowl.

Meanwhile, heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Spray chicken with oil. Add to pan and cook for 4 minutes each side or until browned and cooked through. Remove from heat. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes, then coarsely chop.
Add chicken, spinach, parsley and onion to the risoni mixture and toss to combine.
Whisk juice, oil, garlic and mustard in a jug. Add to the risoni mixture, then toss to combine. Serve.
